abstract: Google Ventures has invested in Trada, which matches small businesses with search marketing experts.
snippet: Google Ventures has invested in Trada, which matches small businesses with search marketing experts.
lead_paragraph: Google makes the vast majority of its money selling search ads. On Wednesday, Google’s venture capital arm will announce that it has invested in Trada, a start-up that makes it easier for small businesses to buy those ads by crowdsourcing the work.

headline.main: Google Ventures Funds a Search Marketing Start-Up
